title: mid 2012 820-3115-b board , os not loading
message:
this board 820-3115-b, intel i7 cpu ,  super clean .. no water damage or anything, 


some time hard to install os, if it install it shows this pls chk pic... 


i changed new hd, and hd cable... still same problem.....cant go to main screen,   tried different version os .. same thing ... any idea ?

title: mid 2012 820-3115-b board , os not loading
message:
it does sound like a possible issue with the BIOS. Does it boot in safe mode, or to internet recovery mode?
also try load windows and Mavericks to see if they work.

title: mid 2012 820-3115-b board , os not loading
message: Can you try Mavericks if havent yet. Might able to force firmware update if available

title: mid 2012 820-3115-b board , os not loading
message: to change the bios you need a bios programmer, and the skills to grab the bit on the original one you need to transfer over
